sentences.sContent: Fish are poikilotherm whose body temperature changes as the ambient water temperature changes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fish are poikilotherm whose body temperature changes as the ambient water temperature changes.
sentences.sCn: 鱼类是变温动物，其体温随环境的水温变化而变化。

words.tran: [动] 变温的；冷血的；冷血动物的（等于poikilothermal）
